attributes.additional_details:
The removal of the "anti-homeless spikes" that were recently added to certain areas of London.

The addition of these spikes is quite frankly disgusting and those involved in the introduction of such a method should be ashamed.

The homeless are people who we need to embrace and not neglect. They're not on the streets from choice but because somebody has let them down in a time of need.

Sign this petition now!
